title: Eisenhower National Historic Site: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons      2015-16 SHUTTLE BUS DEPARTURE SCHEDULE Visits to Eisenhower NHS can be made only by shuttle buses that depart from the Gettysburg National Military Park Museum and Visitor Center.  Shuttle buses depart for Eisenhower NHS at the following times: WINTER 2015-16During the winter season there are days that the site is closed or has a delayed opening due to inclement weather. Call 717-334-1124 for the latest information on park closings.October 26 - November 29   Weekdays: 10:00 am, 11:30 am, 2:00 pm, 3:30 pm. Weekends and the Friday after Thanksgiving: Every hour, 9:00 am - 4:00 pm. November 30 - January 3   10:00 am, 11:30 am, 2:00 pm, 3:30 pm. House is decorated for Christmas, December 1 - 31. Dec. 12: Christmas Holiday Reception, buses every hour, 9:00 am - 4:00 pm. The site is closed Christmas and New Years Day.January 1 - January 3  10:00 am, 11:30 am, 2 pm, 3:30 pm.   January 4 - February 12  10:00 am, 2:00 pm.    February 13 - March 18   10:00 am, 11:30 am, 2 pm, 3:30 pm.   March 19 - March 20  Every hour, 9:00 am - 4:00 pm.  March 21 - March 25  10:00 am, 11:30 am, 2:00 pm, 3:30 pm.   SPRING 2016 March 26 - April 8  Every hour, 9:00 am - 4:00 pm.  April 9 - June 10  Weekdays: Every hour, 9:00 am - 4:00 pm.   Weekends and Memorial Day: Every half hour.  SUMMER 2016 June 11 - August 21  Every half hour, 9:00 am - 4:00 pm. August 22 - September 2  Every hour, 9:00 am - 4:00 pm.   FALL 2016 September 3 - October 23  Weekdays: Every hour, 9:00 am - 4:00 pm. Weekends, Labor Day and Columbus Day: Every half hour (Sept. 17 - 18:  World War II Weekend: buses every half hour and quarter after the hour. And on site parking, weather permitting)  October 24 - November 27  Weekdays: 10:00 am, 11:30 am, 2:00 pm, 3:30 pm.  Weekends and the Friday after Thanksgiving:  Every hour, 9:00 am - 4:00 pm.Site is closed on Thanksgiving.  November 28 - December 31  10:00 am, 11:30 am, 2:00 pm, 3:30 pm. House is decorated for Christmas, December 1 - 31.  Dec. 10: Christmas Holiday Reception, buses every hour, 9:00 am - 4:00 pm.Site is closed Christmas and New Year's Day.
